title: Adams National Historical Park: Photo Gallery
body: Photo Gallery                    The Boston Massacre 2007   16 Photos            The Birthplaces   11 Photos  The John and John Quincy Adams Birthplaces          The Marriage of Abigail & John   9 Photos              The Old House, interior images   21 Photos  Old House at Peace field has twenty-one rooms of history, recollecting two centuries worth of travels and politics.          Portraits in the Old House   36 Photos            The Old House Through Time   20 Photos              The American Revolution   18 Photos            July 4 2008 Jefferson & Adams   13 Photos
